CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 26 The LUMO energy levels of the polymers were determined by combining the HOMO energy levels obtained from CV and the optical bandgap energies obtained from the edges of absorption.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| CV |
| Optical bandgap |

Note: HOMO and LUMO are not actually materials, but rather concepts used in the context of molecular electronics. HOMO stands for "highest occupied molecular orbital" and LUMO stands for "lowest unoccupied molecular orbital". CV stands for "cyclic voltammetry".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "CV" and "optical bandgap", do not clearly refer to material names and have been removed from the table.
